infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission11: After the openning of the door of the Abyss, there has been a lot of visitors from the there,we taged them from the distance,but now we detected the signals in the place of T.S.M.We shall fight them with the swords in our hands!
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission11: We will never allow anyone else step on our land!
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission12: The Heavenly Dog devours the sun with the light of future fading
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission12: The T.S.M is engaging in combat no.73 frontline, has no extra forces to settle this sector, but the guaranteed whoever killed these monsters will get a reward of [reward]mk.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission13: We've detected a number of bigones approaching this area,ETA 5 hours,either you kill those basters, or we all die here.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission13: We're not afraid of the Bugs ever again!
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission14: It's detected that there appeared some CyberWorms，witch significantly affected the safety of this waterway,we promise that you will be paid [reward]mk if killed them.
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission15: All the storms gathered push me to the horizon
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission15: A large swarm of Hammerhead is threatening the safety between [location1] and [location2]，the swarm has damaged countless stations，some places have called them gods.So Captain you need to set off immediately and elimate them.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission15: I will be the one to destory their Altars.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission15: The fall of the old gods, the rise of the new gods.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission16: The T.S.M spotted that a group of Latchers is approaching，We promise that whoever killed there Latchers will get a bounus of [reward]mk.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission16: You did a good job cap,you have secured this area once again.
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission17: The beast of the first sigh
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission17: Captain, our scans have detected multiple Crawler Matrons and their broods engaged in territorial disputes here. Their conflict is disrupting our navigation. We sent a small team of The T.S.M warriors, but they went missing shortly after. Given the urgency, we've chosen you for this mission: eliminate all Crawler populations completely and find out what happened to the missing soldiers.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission17: Inside the crawler's belly, we saw warriors in The T.S.M uniforms. So young, yet forced to fight like soldiers, be used as weapons, and buried like objects. In the end, they won't get the glory and praise they deserve, not even a eulogy or a small grave.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission21: Europa Magical Biology Ink donated a pack of alternated mysterious creatures，but those creatures escaped when the corp was testing them，we've sent the sunset squad to dedal with them，but they lost contact with HQ the second after the encounter.Be aware cap，there are not common Spinelings!Be careful!
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission21: Don't say a word about this mission, or the Europa Magical Biology Ink will be fined heavily.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission23: The EMBI lanched a challenge，their new subject is ready to use，currently recruiting crews who have the courage to fight them，they will record the data will engaging.You will be paid a lot if came back in one piece.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission23: The gods are mourning! Let me hear... who is wailing——
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission23: Dirge of Death has rang, but it's the praise of the connection to another world.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission24: EMBI alternated T044Y subject basd on the data collected last time，currently recruiting crews who have the courage to fight them，don't konw if you're intersted.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission24: The earth's cries echo through the depths, where it roars in rage. The friction of its mandibles sends out piercing shrieks across the nearby waters. The flames it spews keep burning endlessly.....
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission24: The earth's cry echoes in the abyss. Hear it wail in rage, its mandibles' friction screeching across the sea. Flames spew from its maw, burning endlessly.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission25: EMBI alternated Subject009 basd on the data collected last time，currently recruiting crews who have the courage to fight them，don't konw if you're intersted.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission25: The venomous fangs of Experiment Subject 009 have been extracted. Its withered torch wanders in the abyss. The ice is rife with corpses. Yet, fear not, for our steel behemoth watches over us.
infotexts.missionheader0.tsmmission25: The awareness that never fade away
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission25: Desolate Plague sweep across the ice,with the weapon in hand and heart,nothing is eternal.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission26: EMBI alternated T037α basd on the data collected last time，currently recruiting crews who have the courage to fight them.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission26: I shall reveal to you my creation that surpasses the gods.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission26: On Europa, lightning flashes and thunder roars, the giant machine roars, yet the defenses still stand.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission31: EMBI released a pack of new subjects await to be tested。Currently drove into a cave，there're some beacon bases in it，if willing you shall kill the subjects and destory the beacon bases，we will collect the data for fuether tests in the end.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission31: Subjects are all cleaned up,thanks for yout data.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission32: We discovered some guardians and their pods left by alien creatures in a cave.It seems that they are still continue doing their last mission——Clear this cave,your mission is to kill anything alive and destroy their pods.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission32: That's a story about an abandoned destroyed another abandoned.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission32: If there is a chance to leave Europa like the creator of these Machines.I want to see the sunset,to feel the seasons,just like her wish.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission33: Not long after we drove away a hammerhead swarm,there came a new swarm of natives continuing staying in this place.Because of that,this time we will kill them all instead driving them away.We will give you generous rewards.
infotexts.missionheader0.tsmmission33: Add another soul on the list
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission34: We shrinked some latchers in a test,but because of the small size of them is wat too small,they have breached the facility,You shall deal with them before it becomes a trouble,dead or alive.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission34: If there really a day,when the wishes came true,all the consequencese had been cut.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission35: We have detected a swarm of abnormal Molochs attacking the ships between [location1] and [location2].Be aware,these are not common Molochs,be careful of those fierce ones.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission35: Swarm of Molochs has been Cleaned
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission36: More and more people are crowding in the stations causing the lack of rooms.So we decide to open up a new station,we've scanned a ruin which posion is perfect.But there're lots of guardians leaft inside,so we hope you could help us to take care of those things.The money will not be a problem.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission37: We have located the ship of the choir child who attacked, and through remote observation, it seems that she has undergone a secondary mutation. Based on the intelligence provided by Vila, it appears that this mutated worm is the carrier of the previously missing Captain Borenshire. We are not sure what happened during the disappearance period, and Vila has not yet provided any further information. But no matter who the worm is, if left unchecked, it will cause even greater damage.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission37: According to Vila's submitted mission report, the Alliance broke through The T.S.M and executed Berenshire's mentor, Socrates, in the name of righteousness. After that, Beren Hill disappeared without a trace. She was tricked by the Adventists into becoming the key to the Fusion Witch, and the huge mutated worm was the carrier of the Adventists witch. I still remember when we studied together in college, she loved singing so much. I really enjoyed her pulling us together to talk about how great her mentor's ideas were, but unfortunately, I never had the chance to hear them again in the future.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission38: There are some visitors in the shipway,but clearly these creatures are not common variants,they're created by someone.Alright sailors it's time to take out the trash.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission38: After a 'rain,' blood and seawater swapped identities. Above, meteors streaked across the sky; below, mountains of corpses and seas of blood lay beneath our feet.
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission39: The Long Journey of 1.36 Million Miles
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission39: Deep-sea machinery stirs restlessly, the ocean boils, and the roar of a colossal energy source echoes... This channel is shrouded in mystery. Captain, we urge you to investigate.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission39: "Did you know? Europa's subsurface ocean holds endless unknowns, its ice crust tens of kilometers thick—a final lock guarding the secrets of the deep." "Initially, humanity spent decades building a series of deep-sea colonial stations. Through the pioneer probe 'Europa Pioneer,' we drilled through the ice and laid the groundwork for infrastructure. These stations were self-sufficient, connected by a network of subsea tunnels that linked steel islands floating in the abyss." "Yet, humanity's transformation of Europa faltered. As colonies expanded, unforeseen issues arose. Stations faced 'ecological anomalies'—native lifeforms, experimental species, or secrets from the abyss began proliferating. These entities, products of rapid evolution, displayed parasitic and predatory traits. Worse, chemical pollutants from probes and mining equipment awakened ancient, unspeakable beings." "Then Earth fell silent. Infighting, attacks by deep-sea horrors... The once-hopeful colonization became synonymous with terror. Colonists faced frequent 'abyssal crises': equipment destroyed, submersibles vanishing..." "Now, colonization treads cautiously. Stations rely on fragile submarine passages; every dive risks life and death. Europa is no mere frontier—it is a dangerous unknown, a symbol of both hope and humanity's folly. Rumors say its depths hide more: a true alien biosphere, or entities beyond imagination."
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission40: We previously recovered an ancient plague entity in this channel. While purging infected creatures, several Molochs breached defenses and escaped. Days later, witnesses reported mutated Molochs variants here. Investigate if these are the escaped ones.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission40: The plague infects not just humans but other creatures. Infected monsters grow more aggressive—it seems they aim to cleanse these waters.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission41: Intense pulse interference detected. Severe tremors plague this channel. Captains, steer clear. The T.S.M will resolve this.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission41: I surrender time to the abyss, letting it churn beneath my steed. I dig my grave within my own eyes.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission42: On Earth, there were whalers. On Europa, we have similar hunters—but their prey is no ordinary whale. Sailor, head to the target zone and eliminate all cetacean lifeforms.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission42: Congratulations, you've become a qualified whaler.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission43: The Alliance's Dreadnought Fleet fell in this region. Yet intel suggests they still 'live.' Your mission: ensure their true demise. Note: hyper-mobile combat tactics are advised.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission43: A true Dreadnought Fleet belongs in the Ship Graveyard.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission44: Captain, a mining station reports their vessels attacked by the mine itself. Absurd as it sounds, investigate nonetheless.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission44: I fear our sins will one day bury us on this alien soil.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission45: Two alien constructs, driven by twin human brains, wreak havoc here. Though the technology is unclear, it is undeniably inhumane. End their suffering.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission45: Civilization and history weigh it down.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission46: When wings become fins, invasion begins. They dwell in abyssal caves, guardians like dragons. This is their kingdom—challenge their brood, and war begins.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission46: Victors need not respect life; true harmony is a myth. When the final thunderous strike falls, even the cave's guardians become the ocean's sustenance, leaving nothing behind.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission47: A new fish species, the Cloudpiercer Whale, glides through the sea like birds through clouds. Docile yet powerful, their meat is a delicacy. But provoke them, and they swarm. A cave harbors their eggs—eliminate the threat, and fishermen can harvest freely.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission47: The crew captured an image—a record of humanity's vilest crime: the genocide of a species.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_qrf: The Coalition's Rapid Response Force is deploying at this abandoned site, preparing to raid a nearby hostile site. However, the nearby sites will not sit idly by. This is your moment to earn glory. Clear out all the rapid response forces and destroy the reactor!
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_qrf: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_qrf: ???: Nice work. This operation has dealt a heavy blow to the Coalition's morale. The money has been deposited into your account. Remember, no one gave you orders. This was your doing.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_beowulf: Beowulf was initially established jointly by the Coalition and TSM as a riot control and counter-terrorism unit. Since the separatists declared war, this unit's responsibilities have far exceeded traditional riot control and have been granted higher authority. However, during one incident, their actions spiraled out of control, leading to the death of numerous hostages. This tragedy not only sparked public outrage but also placed their captain on the Coalition's most-wanted list. Now is the time to strike while they are vulnerable, Captain! Capture this site and destroy the reactor. Courage and glory will be yours!
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_beowulf: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_beowulf: Countless challengers thrust their blades deep into the dragon's belly, killing it. As the dragon lay dying, it finally remembered its name—Beowulf.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_occupation: The Coalition's occupying forces, known for their heavy armor and firepower, have implemented a full military lockdown of the area. Per the latest orders from the separatists' command headquarters: our mission is to completely eliminate all enemy forces in the area and destroy the reactor, clearing a safe path for our main forces. All ship commanders, please ensure your vessels are fully prepared for combat before engaging the enemy.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_occupation: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_occupation: The occupying forces watched helplessly as they were consumed by the reactor's explosion. Meanwhile, within another site, separatists and Coalition soldiers continued to fight. The light and heat from the reactor explosion reached them as well, and they watched the same flash slowly fade away. All of this began with politicians standing on opposing platforms, hurling insults at each other. A verbal duel turned into a bloody war. Outsiders wished to tear apart the opposing factions, while the true participants just wanted to go home.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_coalition: A small group of Coalition soldiers is active in this area. Considering the previous declaration of war between the separatists and the Coalition, they will not welcome your presence. If you wish to maintain good relations with the Coalition, it is better not to get involved.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_coalition: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_coalition: Separatists Liaison: We are pleased that the Captain has chosen the path of righteousness.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_separatist: The local residents oppose the Coalition forces stationed at [location1]. After the Coalition forces withdrew, the separatists quietly infiltrated the site. As the maintainers of order on Europa, we cannot tolerate such actions by the enemy. Captain, raid this site, eliminate their leader, and show the separatists who the true enforcers are.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_separatists: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_separatists: Coalition Liaison: Captain, do not let up after this. We have more battles to fight.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_Anonymous: Urgent report from the combat zone command: armed uprisings in multiple locations have drawn the attention of the Coalition's high command. It has been confirmed that the separatists' elite "Sharp Raiders" have established a stronghold at [location1], intending to raid surrounding facilities. The objective this time is to eliminate all raiders and destroy the reactor.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_Anonymous: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_Anonymous: Coalition Liaison: Captain, the admiral has received our victorious news and commended us. Meanwhile, we have also interrogated the mastermind behind this separatists' "uprising"—General Victoria Pedran. It is time to plan for the next operation.
infotexts.missionname.tsm_combat_yehuo: Wildfire - The Last Blooming Red Flower
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_yehuo: In an effort to weaken the Coalition's dominance in this sea area, the Wildfire separatists launched a surprise attack and annihilated the Coalition garrison at [location1]. According to reconnaissance intelligence, after successfully capturing most of the area's strongholds, the separatists are now massing their forces to launch a final assault. Mission objective: eliminate all separatists and destroy the reactor.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_yehuo: Is this the ending you desired?
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_yehuo: The last separatist member fell, shouting before dying, "We will burn like wildfire, and one day we will consume the Coalition completely!" What do people truly seek, and for what purpose? They fight each other—does the bloodshed serve to make the flowers bloom?
infotexts.tsm_haulagecombat_1.c1: There's an urgent commission here. Our cooperation with them hinges on this. A group of overconfident vermin thinks they can bite off more than they can chew. If you're willing to take it on, the reward will definitely be worth it.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_haulagecombat_1: A group of blind-sided pirates has stolen a batch of data modules containing personal privacy. I don't want these to be sold openly. Either they die or they disappear with the items (Note: The ship's hull is invincible and cannot be broken, so please board freely, but be aware of the slow-firing cannons on the ship.)
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_haulagecombat_1: Disappointing, but I suppose the black market will find more suitable partners than you.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_haulagecombat_1: Time to throw them overboard to the fish.
infotexts.missionmessage1.tsm_haulagecombat_1: Those who pry into secrets have paid the price. Now, we can discuss other collaborations.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_crosstalk:
Calling Turquoise, Turquoise, come in!
Damn it, they've jammed our signals. Wait, a submarine is docking.
..........
Where have you guys been? We need reinforcements!
This is TSM Advanced Combat Division, preparing to intercept.
Drive these Coalition dogs out of our territory!
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_crosstalk: Report: All personnel killed in action.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_crosstalk: Thank you, Captain, for dealing with the Coalition's interference squad. Rest assured, we will not disclose any information about you.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_escort: A fully armed Coalition squad needs to board your ship to head to the next station, but they don't seem very legitimate. Be cautious.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsm_combat_escort: The Coalition's bandits deserve to be thrown into the abyss to feed the fish.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_escort: The ship has been requisitioned for military use.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_escort: You Coalition dogs, get off my ship!
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_aria: A combat squad from the Advanced Operations Department has long heard of your heroic deeds. They wish to conduct a realistic combat drill with you and hope to receive your professional guidance during the exercise.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_aria: No casualties were sustained in this mission. We look forward to your performance in the next drill.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_aria: Hope we can have another sparring opportunity.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_adventists_save: We have located Miss Qiu, who has been kidnapped to [location1]. Judging by the decorations, it appears to be the work of the Adventists. We need to rescue Miss Qiu and safely deliver her to a TSM station, ensuring her safety at all costs.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsm_adventists_save: Mission complete. We will take over the escort from here.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_adventists_save: As she left, she kept looking back, seemingly trying to remember your face.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_advisers: Our forces have recently noticed anomalies in combat against the separatists: the enemy's tactics show significant targeted characteristics, and their strategic patterns closely match the tactical systems encountered by the Coalition forces in past TSM campaigns. After tactical analysis, it is confirmed that military advisors from TSM are involved in guiding the separatists' actions. According to the latest intelligence, the target building not only gathers TSM feline military advisors but also stations a large number of elite separatist combat units. The mission this time is to completely eliminate the enemy's command center and primarily annihilate all feline advisors.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_advisers: All the stars tonight will drown in the water.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_advisers: Obstacles and bullets, used by the enemy to block our way, we laugh them off and then march through defiantly.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_adventists: Based on the information obtained from the thieves last time, they are now likely working with the Adventists. We can use this opportunity to take them all down. This time, we will send a squad to raid the site with you, and they have already been arranged. Once you start the operation, they will coordinate with you.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_adventists: Actions that should have been taken, repeatedly delayed.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_adventists: Our first joint raid on the site went well. Let's hope for better coordination next time.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsm_combat_nz: Some individuals with exceptional marksmanship have taken over this site. Each of them wields a hand cannon, eager for a fair duel.
infotexts.missionfailure.tsm_combat_nz: The first shot declares my arrival; the second shot announces your death.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsm_combat_nz: The bullet pierced through the brain. In a daze, he seemed to stand on a stage, seeing the audience in complete darkness, yet he could clearly hear two people speaking. “Who is playing on this stage?” one voice questioned. Another voice replied, “The person on stage seems clumsy yet moves with ease. If he is not playing the fool, then he must be the king.” As soon as the words were spoken, applause erupted from the audience, and a joyful symphony began to play. Ladies and gentlemen, this is the end of Solomon.

Override.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostrescu: According to reliable intelligence, a mercenary group has kidnapped a well-known business leader in the [location1] area and established a temporary stronghold. The family of the kidnapped individual has commissioned our organization to conduct a tactical rescue operation, with the primary objective of safely extracting the target person.
Override.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostrescue2: We have successfully rescued the hostages.
Override.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostrescue2: The hostages are all on board. Time to return and report.
Override.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostrescu: Confirmed by frontline reconnaissance, a mercenary squad of about one company size has conducted a pinpoint destruction at [location1] and kidnapped several hostages. They are now using the safety of the hostages as leverage to extort a high protection fee from nearby sites. After tactical assessment, the armed group has the capability for rapid maneuver and strike, threatening to continue destroying facilities along the supply line if their demands are not met. The affected facility has reached a strategic cooperation agreement with the captain and commissioned a special rescue operation.
Override.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostrescue3: We have successfully rescued the hostages.
Override.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostrescue3: The hostages are all on board. Time to return and report.

infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission51: A station recently went dark. Prior to this, special eggs were delivered here—suspected sabotage. Your task: purge all life and destroy the reactor.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission51: Station cleared. We'll handle the rest.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission51: The T.S.M traced the cargo's origins. Decrypting the data will expose those behind this. They will pay.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission52: Zero-Type Plague Carrier was escorted to unknown coordinates under a cryptic order. After a stop at [location1], the city fell silent. Our scouts found it overrun by plague variants. Investigate the escort's actions, purge all life, and destroy the reactor.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission52: Clues from the purged city are scarce. The encryption key for the order didn't originate from The T.S.M's upper echelons. Verify the data at HQ. Meanwhile, gather intel on the escort.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission53: Death's melody echoes in their ears. Souls from the abyss claw into the station. Muddy eyes see nothing. "I slept long... Now I awaken." (Objective: Purge all life and destroy the reactor.)
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission53: No soul remains in the husk, yet the song lingers... She still sings.
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission60: All in the Name of Justice
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission60: The T.S.M has sealed the channel between [location1] and [location2]. Now, you wade into the chaos.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission60: Life fades like water into water.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission60: "I've seen things you wouldn't believe. Attack ships on fire off Orion's shoulder. C-beams glittering in the dark near Tannhäuser Gate. All moments lost in time... like tears in rain."
infotexts.missionheader0.tsmattack: Operation Start. Rules of Engagement: Lethal Force Authorized
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmattack: This world has no shortage of death.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin1: An Apocalypse Worm harasses our transports between [location1] and [location2]. Bounty: [reward]mk for its death.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin1: Reward will be sent upon reaching the next station.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin2: A banshee haunts the channel between [location1] and [location2], attacking ships and stations. Bounty: [reward]mk for its head.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin2: Payment sent upon arrival at next station.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin3: An invasive Latcher disrupts abyssal mining. Reward: [reward]mk for its death.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin4: Abyssal surveyors detected a Cyber Worm. Bounty: [reward]mk to ensure safe operations.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin5: Giant Spines infest the channel, threatening safety. Eliminate them.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin5: Reward [reward]mk sent. Channel restored to calm.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin6: Venomous serpents poison crews. Eliminate them to ensure safety.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin6: Reward [reward]mk sent. No more poison deaths.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin7: A large number of raptors have taken over what was once a safe passage, threatening the security of surrounding stations. We are offering a reward of [reward]mk for a fleet capable of ambushing these raptors.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin7: Congratulations on completing the mission. [reward]mk will be sent to your account upon arrival at the next station. The ambush was perfectly executed.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin8: A group of reckless crew members killed some Moloch offspring while passing through the route between [location1] and [location2]. Now, a swarm of black Molochs has taken over the passage. We have no choice but to recruit brave warriors to help resolve the situation.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin8: Congratulations on completing the mission. [reward]mk will be sent to your account upon arrival at the next station. All black Molochs have been annihilated.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin9: A group of thresher beasts has taken over the passage, attacking nearby stations and destroying passing ships. Several brave warriors were sent to deal with them, but none have returned. A fleet that successfully exterminates these threshers and returns safely will be rewarded at the next station.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin9: Congratulations on completing the mission. [reward]mk will be sent to your account upon arrival at the next station. The thresher clan could not escape extermination.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin10: A relic exploration team accidentally released several guardians while exploring a ruin. These guardians have caused serious safety incidents. We need someone to clean up the mess.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin10: Congratulations on completing the mission. [reward]mk will be sent to your account upon arrival at the next station. But strictly speaking, we are the aliens.
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin11: Bounty Mission: Barbarians in the Cave
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin11: This bounty is issued by the Skinning Sect. Some radical members, after consuming specially crafted skinning eggs, robbed the sect's skinning boxes and fled to a cave. The sect hopes someone can help clean house and destroy those skinning boxes.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin11: Congratulations on completing the mission. [reward]mk will be sent to your account upon arrival at the next station. Such strong bodies, such low intelligence—was the ascension a success or a failure?
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin12: EMBI Corporation is offering a substantial reward for the transportation of a batch of test subjects to the next designated location.Note that Experiment 003 requires a continuous supply of paralytic agent; failure to do so will pose a risk of awakening.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin12: Excellent. This will expedite our research progress significantly.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin13: Several boxes of decaying matter urgently need to be transported to [location2]. Note! You only have ten minutes.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin14: A tycoon in [location2] has ordered some high-grade leather. These leathers are very precious and cannot get wet, as they will be ruined if they do. So transport them with extreme care.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin15: The T.S.M has arrested several members of the Arrival Faction and now needs them transported to the next station for interrogation.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin16: A mysterious person has commissioned us to transport a package to another mysterious person. He also revealed that this package is Xilock's Treasure (allegedly, Xilock's Treasure can decompose into anything, but it's all a matter of luck).
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin17: The T.S.M has commissioned us to transport a batch of raw ore. Note that if you are caught embezzling by the T.S.M, you will be fined.
infotexts.eventtext.tsmmission.mcrate_replenishmen: The number of ore supply boxes does not match the manifest. Your words are not trustworthy.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin18: [location2] is experiencing a shortage of medical supplies. They have ordered a batch from the T.S.M, which needs to be delivered urgently.
infotexts.eventtext.tsmmission.yl_replenishment: You embezzled medical supplies, causing front-line warriors to miss timely treatment.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin19: A squad from the T.S.M wishes to hitch a ride on your ship to the next station.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin20: A large swarm of crawlers has taken over the passage. We have tried to drive them away multiple times, but with little effect. They are fearless even against station security forces—these are no ordinary crawlers. A heavy hand is required.
infotexts.missionsuccess.tsmmission_origin20: Crawlers are overseeing submarine driving and training the crew's shooting skills, truly meticulous and deliberate.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_origin20: Crawlers are overseeing submarine driving and training the crew's shooting skills, truly meticulous and deliberate.
infotexts.missionname.tsmmission_origin21: Bounty Mission: Farewell to the Destroyer Worm
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_origin21: The Destroyer Worm, dormant in the abyss, has become active again. Surrounding stations have issued emergency alerts, causing widespread panic. Someone is offering [reward]mk for the Destroyer Worm's head.
infotexts.missiondescription.tsmmission_event_lin: Lin Heyin wants you to eliminate T037, which is active in this sea area, and retrieve the brain-computer interface port system from it.
infotexts.missionmessage0.tsmmission_event_lin: Return to the nearest T.S.M. station—Lin Heyin will be waiting for you there.
infotexts.tsm_combat_tsm_event.1: "Cat Advisor" to T.S.M, emergency situation! Requesting reinforcements!
infotexts.tsm_combat_tsm_event.2: Hold on, Advisor! The Chief Instructor ordered me to bring all of you back safe and sound.
infotexts.tsm_combat_occupation_event.1: Situation critical! Nearby Rapid Response Units are closing in on this outpost—we need to hurry!
infotexts.tsm_combat_beowulf_event.1: Damn it! We intercepted a transmission from Squadron Beowulf—they're calling for reinforcements. The Coalition's closest Rapid Response Unit is en route; we have to step it up!
infotexts.tsm_combat_yehuo_event.1: Wildfire to Warhammer Support Team! Enemy contact confirmed—reinforcements needed! Reinforcements needed!
infotexts.tsm_darkstormynight.2: That doesn't bode well. Today's definitely not a good day to throw our lives away.
infotexts.tsm_darkstormynight.3: Time for a real gunslinger's duel!
infotexts.tsm_combat_adventists_event_tsm.1: T.S.M Outpost 2 Assault Squadron: Reached designated position—commencing attack. \n\nAdventist Leader: Fools! Daring to march right to our doorstep? Deploy our modified machinery!
infotexts.tsm_fire_water_1: You feel intense heat outside the submarine, breaking into a sweat in moments. Reaching out to touch the hull, you jerk your hand back—it's scorching hot. Could something out there be boiling the seawater? \nI think I need to put on a diving suit right away.
infotexts.tsm.warming1.1: This navigation route has been blockaded by T.S.M. Immediately reverse course, or we will initiate forced expulsion!
infotexts.tsm.warming1.2: Final warning! Reverse course at once!
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mcrate_time1: A crate of decaying matter, with a shelf life of only ten minutes
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mcrate_water1: A whole crate of high-quality leather, if it gets wet, it will be damaged, be careful, ordinary people can't afford to compensate for this
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_mcrate_shillok: It is said that this pocket can contain anything, why not decompose it and see what you can get?
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_t037a_missionitem: Mission item—Dr. Lin Han’s device, which he attempted to use for communicating with T037.
Mission item—Dr. Lin Han’s device, which he attempted to use for communicating with T037.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_experimental_003: It will awaken once the paralytic agent is exhausted
infotexts.entitydescription.mvdxe: A proof of your victory over her.
infotexts.entitydescription.lldyj: A proof of your victory over her.
infotexts.entitydescription.hyddx: A proof of your victory over her.
infotexts.entitydescription.ddbm: A proof of your victory over her.
infotexts.entitydescription.AlbinismSpineling: Can be used to craft railgun shells or deconstruct into steel.
infotexts.entitydescription.AlbinismSpineling_shel: Can be loaded with canister shell pellets.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_skypiercingdolphin: Lightly cooked, it is fresh and tender—an exquisite delicacy that lingers on the palate, comparable to a royal feast. It can fetch a good price at outposts.

The Skypiercingdolphin has evolved an extremely hard head cone for self-defense, which is also crucial for competing for habitats and attracting mates. Its hardness is so extreme that no chef can do anything with it, and no one at the outpost wants it. But the security officer who first thought to load it into a railgun loader was a genius.

Premium meat marinated in yeast, mouthwatering and irresistible. It’s best wrapped in a waterproof tarpaulin—even in the low temperature of seawater, it will spoil if not consumed, wasting such a precious resource.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_eclipticshadow_blo: A rare plasma harvested from the Eclipticshadow, emitting a faint glow in the dark. It is a valuable medicinal ingredient that can be extracted using a medical fabricator. Direct use is not recommended, as it may cause muscle paralysis.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_eclipticshadow_sta: A concentrated component extracted from Eclipticshadow blood, offering significant detoxification effects. However, improper use may result in paralysis.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_eclipticshadow_wat: "Let the delicate bubbles burst on your taste buds! Every sip is a mental yoga after navigation!" The ingredient list claims it contains 2% rare Eclipticshadow blood extract—but let’s be real, it’s just artificial additives and gimmicks.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_alienpistol_blue_b: A weapon of alien machinery, but it's damaged and won't fetch a good price—though it might yield valuable materials when disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_alienpistol_red_br: A weapon of alien machinery, but it's damaged and won't fetch a good price—though it might yield valuable materials when disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_guardianhookcannon: A weapon of alien machinery, but it's damaged and won't fetch a good price—though it might yield valuable materials when disassembled.
A weapon of alien machinery, but it's damaged and won't fetch a good price—though it might yield valuable materials when disassembled.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_map_suit_ai: This suit was damaged in combat, and many of its functions have failed.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_rap_suit_ai: This suit was damaged in combat, and many of its functions have failed.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_rz_pirent_ai: This exoskeleton was damaged in combat, and many of its functions have failed.
infotexts.entitydescription.tsm_rz_3a_ai: This exoskeleton was damaged in combat, and many of its functions have failed.
